author: 小浪财讯
title: A500指数ETF（560610）跌0.74%，半日成交额2.86亿元|ETF_新浪财经_新浪网
text:
6月19日，截止午间收盘，A500指数ETF（560610）跌0.74%，报0.937元，成交额2.86亿元。A500指数ETF（560610）重仓股方面， 贵州茅台 截止午盘涨0.00%， 宁德时代 跌1.13%， 中国平安 跌0.93%， 招商银行 跌0.70%， 美的集团 跌0.65%， 长江电力 跌0.33%， 比亚迪 跌1.40%， 兴业银行 跌0.08%， 紫金矿业 跌1.44%， 东方财富 跌2.19%。
A500指数ETF（560610）业绩比较基准为 中证A500指数 收益率，管理人为招商基金管理有限公司，基金经理为刘重杰、许荣漫，成立（2024-09-26）以来回报为-5.47%，近一个月回报为-0.05%。

author: Shane Hickey in London
title: Irish officials asked UK to drop Omagh bombing information appeal, files show – The Irish Times
text: Irish civil servants wanted an appeal for information into the Omagh bombing dropped over fears that it would anger Sinn Féin and put the progress of the peace process in jeopardy. The British government wanted to mark the second anniversary of the Omagh bombing with a joint statement from prime minister Tony Blair and taoiseach Bertie Ahern but Irish officials wanted it watered down to exclude the appeal, a move that was described as an over-reaction. New government files from 2000 released by the National Archives in London show that the initial statement had a sentence that read: “We call on everyone with any information about the atrocity to share it with the police.” The appeal came as a result of pressure from relatives who were frustrated at the lack of progress in the investigation. The 1998 bombing, carried out by the Real IRA, killed 29 people and was the deadliest single incident during the Troubles. [X case ‘horror’, ‘gay bashing’, and republican ‘headbangers’: State papers shed light on a turbulent decade](/history/2023/12/28/x-case-horror-gay-bashing-and-republican-headbangers-state-papers-shed-light-on-a-turbulent-decade/) While Irish civil servants backed the idea of a joint statement, they would not accept the appeal for information, according to a memo to Blair from Anna Wechsberg, his private secretary for foreign affairs. The Irish side feared that the next confidence building mechanism (CBM), a planned step as part of the peace process, would be threatened if the statement was included. “They are worried that an appeal in this context would be read by Sinn Féin as a move against them, and put the next CBM at risk. We think the taoiseach himself has probably not been consulted, but there is no sign of movement at official level,” wrote Wechsberg. The Northern Ireland Office believed the Irish were “over-reacting” and wanted the appeal kept in, although Wechsberg said this was unlikely to be accepted. The British ambassador to Ireland, Ivor Roberts, said the three Irish departments involved – Foreign Affairs, Justice and the Taoiseach – wanted to steer away from “getting at” any political parties. Other files show Ahern shut down suggestions in 2000 that the queen should visit Ireland over concerns about timing and security. Blair floated the idea with the then taoiseach during a private discussion between the two men. According to a memo of the meeting, Ahern was supportive of the idea but the time “was not yet right”. “He was not certain that the security risks are yet manageable and he was mindful of the damage that could be caused by anything untoward happening,” wrote Michael Tatham, a diplomat, following the meeting. “But this was something that should definitely happen after there had been further progress.” Queen Elizabeth II made a historic state visit to Ireland in May 2011, the first UK monarch to visit the Republic.

author: EFE
title: Israel intensifica os ataques no centro e no sur de Gaza mentres as vítimas superan os 21.300 - Faro de Vigo
text: Os mortos en Gaza pola ofensiva militar de Israel superan os 21.300 e os feridos son máis de 55.600, despois de que nas últimas 24 horas morresen 210 persoas e 360 resultasen feridas, informou este xoves o Ministerio de Sanidade da Franxa palestina. O ministerio, controlado polo grupo islamita [Hamás](/tags/hamas/), denunciou nun comunicado "vinte masacres contra familias enteiras", que elevan a 21.320 os falecidos e a 55.603 os feridos tras 83 días de guerra. Sanidade advertiu novamente de ataques a centros médicos. Polo menos 142 instalacións sanitarias e 104 ambulancias foron atacadas "deliberadamente" desde o comezo da ofensiva israelí hai máis de dous meses e medio, quedando en moitos casos fóra de servizo. Ademais de que case un centenar de traballadores sanitarios, incluídos directores de hospitais, seguen detidos por forzas israelís, segundo o comunicado. "A ocupación israelí ataca varias veces as proximidades do Complexo Médico Nasser e o Hospital Ao-Amal afiliado á Media Lúa Vermella en Jan Yuni" nas últimas horas, engadiu. Respecto diso, a Media Lúa Vermella palestina asegurou que nos bombardeos israelís preto dese hospital morreron nas últimas horas dez persoas e 21 resultaron feridas, no quinto ataque en menos dunha semana. O mércores houbo 31 mortos e 25 feridos no "asedio" ao Hospital Ao-Amal, moitos deles desprazados pola guerra que buscan refuxio nas súas instalacións, subliñou nun comunicado. A sede da organización humanitaria e os arredores deste hospital que rexenta en Jan Yunis, no sur de Gaza [, acollen a preto de 14.000 desprazados, destacou. ](/tags/franja-de-gaza/) Os ataques de artillería israelí provocaron graves danos na súa sede o mércores, con numerosos feridos e a destrución do sistema de comunicacións, complicando aínda máis o traballo de servizos como o de ambulancias, lamentou. O ataque a Israel do grupo islamita Hamás o pasado 7 de outubro provocou máis de 1.200 mortos e uns 240 reféns foron levados a Gaza. Israel declarou a guerra a Hamás en Gaza e lanzou unha ofensiva por terra, mar e aire que ademais dese enorme número de vítimas obrigou a desprazarse a preto de 1,9 millóns de gazatíes, ao redor do 85 % da poboación do enclave.

author: Евгения Патановская
title: Метеозависимых просят не расслабляться: магнитный шторм приближается к Земле
text:
3 июля – ИА SM.News. 3 июля – ИА SM.News. В ближайшие несколько дней на Землю обрушится новый шторм магнитных бурт, поэтому метеозависимых людей просят не расслабляться. Им рекомендовано не уезжать без надобности на длинные расстояния из дома и приготовить все необходимые средства для поддержания здоровья.
Ученые пояснили, что пока на Земле началась передышка после мощной солнечной активности, которая продолжалась до раннего утра четверга, 3 июля.
«Шансы новых вспышек 3 июля на главной Звезде – Солнце, вероятны на 60 процентов. Но эти вспышки могут иметь слабое значение и не предоставят землянам неудобств», — пояснили ученые.
По их прогнозам, следующие штормы с большей вероятностью начнутся уже с 10 июля. Но шторм обещает быть незначительным, а вот 22 июля начнется серьезная солнечная атака на Землю.
«Повышенную геомагнитную активность ожидают 12, 21 и 28-29 июля», — констатируют ученые.
Ранее ИА SM-NEWS сообщало о «ядовитом Солнце» в конце июня.

author: Erin Lowrey
title: Georgia murder suspect arrested after motel stand-off in Covington
text:
St. Tammany deputies arrest Georgia murder suspect after standoff in Covington
St. Tammany deputies arrest Georgia murder suspect after standoff in Covington
SERVING AS THE GETAWAY DRIVER. ALL THREE ARE FACING SECOND DEGREE MURDER CHARGES. AT 603 RIGHT NOW ON THE NORTH SHORE, A SUSPECT IS BEHIND BARS AFTER A STANDOFF WITH A SWAT TEAM IN COVINGTON. OFFICIALS WITH THE SAINT TAMMANY PARISH SHERIFF’S OFFICE SAY THIS HAPPENED AT GREEN SPRINGS MOTEL ON HIGHWAY 21 LAST NIGHT. LET’S TAKE A LOOK AT VIDEO WE SHOT AT THE SCENE RIGHT NOW. WE KNOW THERE WAS A LARGE LAW ENFORCEMENT PRESENCE CALLED IN, TRYING TO CAPTURE A SUSPECT WANTED OUT OF STATE. WE ARE WORKING TO FIND OUT ADDITIONAL DETAILS ABOUT THAT PERSON AND WHY THEY WERE WANTED BY POLICE.
Advertisement
St. Tammany deputies arrest Georgia murder suspect after standoff in Covington
The St. Tammany Parish Sheriff's Office has announced an arrest after a standoff at a Covington-area motel Wednesday night. According to the St. Tammany sheriff's office, a man wanted for murder out of Georgia was arrested at theDeputies responded to the motel after they were told the man, Kenneth Hardin Jr., was wanted for a murder that happened in Fayette County, Georgia and was believed to be at the motel. A standoff began before Hardin Jr. exited one of the rooms and was taken into custody. He was booked in the St. Tammany Parish Correctional Center as a fugitive. He will be extradited back to Georgia.

author: cnn.com
title: Krewe of Sobek rolls under sunny skies ahead of the big winter storm
text:
SHREVEPORT, La. - Mother Nature was smiling down on the Krewe of Sobek Saturday afternoon ahead of the big winter blast expected next week. The krewe's parade rolled through the city's Queensborough neighborhood under beautiful, sunny skies, breezy conditions, and temps in the low to mid 50s. The theme for 2024 was Sobek Rides the Orient Express!
It was indeed a perfect day for a Mardi Gras parade and Carnival season is just getting started in the ArkLaTex. Folks came from near and far for the festivities.
The Krewe of Sobek has been around for 21 years. This was the 19th parade. Organizers say it's more than just a party; They have a purpose, and are passionate about helping young people with scholarships. The krewe has 175 members. Click here for much on the Krewe of Sobek.
Grand Marshal Col. Joseph A. Cooke, Jr.
This year's parade grand marshal was Col. Joseph A. Cooke, Jr. Col. Cooke is the Delaware Army National Guard's Deputy Chief of Staff for Personnel. In over 34 years of military service, Col. Cooke held a series of key command and staff positions. Col. Cooke's awards and decorations include the Bronze Star Medal, Defense Meritorious Service Medal, and Meritorious Service Medal with Oak Leaf Cluster.
Capt. Rosiland Howard
Co-Capt. Eric Monroe
Captain Rosalind Howard and Co-Captain Eric Monroe served along with Billy Anderson, Jr. and Tamara Flentroy who are this year's king and queen.
King Billy Anderson, Jr.
Queen Tamara Flentroy
ABOUT THE PARADE
The parade started at Fair Grounds Field. The floats rolled onto Greenwood Road headed west, then made a right turn and headed north on Mertis Avenue. They then turned right onto Lakeshore Drive and then headed south on Missouri Avenue back to Fair Grounds Field.
ABOUT THE KREWE OF SOBEK
The Krewe of Sobek is dedicated to bringing the time-honored traditions and experience of Mardi Gras to the inner city. They are a non-profit, social and charitable organization founded in April 2003. The krewe’s goals are to support organizations that provide a helpful hand to those in need within our community. Also, to provide fellowship among the members and the community, take part in charitable and non-political civic causes and participate in various parades and celebrations in the Louisiana area.
MARDI GRAS IN THE ARKLATEX
Mardi Gras season in the ArkLaTex is just getting started and there are parties and parades for everyone. Click here to connect with our Mardi Gras page to see the line-up of events. Remember, KTBS 3 is Your Official Mardi Gras Station in the ArkLaTex.
The Krewe of Sobek parade began at 1 p.m. and was livestreamed on KTBS.com and on your KTBS 3 Now connected devices. Broadcast coverage of the parade was set for 4 p.m. Saturday on KPXJ CW 21.
We want to see how you Let the Good Times Roll . Be sure and send us your Mardi Gras pictures and videos all season to pics@KTBS.com and use #KTBSMardiGras when posting to social media.

author: Leo Stallworth
title: Ventura family displaced from home, facing months of cleanup after flash flooding - ABC7 Los Angeles
text: VENTURA, Calif. (KABC) -- Even as high surf pounds coastal Southern California this week, some Ventura County homeowners are still cleaning up damage from last week's flash floods. The Blackwell family is left living out of an Airbnb after murky, knee-deep water flooded the entire first floor of their Ventura home. The Blackwells don't live in a flood zone, so they don't have flood insurance. They are stuck with massive repair bills even as they won't be able to return to their home for some time. Amanda Blackwell has started a GoFundMe to help her parents rebuild, spelling out the nightmare in a detailed narrative on the page. The flood happened in the early morning hours last week. The family noticed the street outside their home was submerged in water as the rain came down in sheets. It appeared the rain was too much for the storm drains on their street to handle. The swelling water turned into a rushing river that slammed into their garage and wound through their entire first floor. "It started coming in and at that point, we were like, We have to stop it," Amanda Blackwell said. "And you know, no, no, you can't stop the water." "And then that's kind of when my survival brain clicked on and I ran to the window to kind of assess what was happening outside and I saw my car underwater. It was floating, the mailbox in the front was almost completely submerged." Mike Blackwell tried to go outside with a shovel and unclog the storm drain. The water rose up to his waist and he had to stop out of fears of getting swept away. "I stopped because it was kind of swift going downstream," he said. "Amanda was out - my daughter - and she says Dad, don't go any farther." Several of their neighbors suffered water damage as well. The Blackwells expect to be displaced for several months.

author: Digital Spy
title: Zelenskyy: UK has stood by Ukraine since beginning of war
text:
ITN Zelenskyy: UK has stood by Ukraine since beginning of war Read full article ITN 19 January 2024 at 8:49 pm
Volodymyr Zelenskyy has asserted the UK had supported Ukraine since the first days of the war, noting his good relationship with "all of [its] prime ministers". In an interview with Channel 4 News’, the Ukrainian president admitted western leaders "didn't believe in [Ukraine]", adding "people really don't like losers and they don't trust them".
